items: Begin in Warrior II pose, with your right foot forward and left foot back.
Turn your left foot in slightly and extend your arms out to the sides, parallel to the floor.
Lean your torso forward and place your right hand on your right thigh.
Reach your left arm up and overhead, creating a straight line from your left foot to your left fingertips.
Keep your gaze up towards your left hand.
Hold for several breaths, then release and repeat on the other side.
